named-query.name: FIND_ALL_STORE_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT s.uidPk FROM StoreImpl s

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_COMPLETE_STORE_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT s.uidPk FROM StoreImpl s WHERE s.storeState < ?1 OR s.storeState >= ?2

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_STORES
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM StoreImpl s

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_COMPLETE_STORES
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM StoreImpl s WHERE s.storeState < ?1 OR s.storeState >= ?2

named-query.name: FIND_STORE_WITH_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM StoreImpl s WHERE UPPER(s.code) = UPPER(?1)

named-query.name: FIND_CATALOG_CODE_WITH_STORE_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT store.catalog.code FROM StoreImpl store WHERE UPPER(store.code) = UPPER(?1)

named-query.name: FIND_STORE_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM StoreImpl s WHERE s.name = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_STORE_BY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM StoreImpl s WHERE s.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_STORES_WITH_STATE
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM StoreImpl s WHERE s.storeState = ?1

named-query.name: TAX_CODES_WITH_STORE
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT t.code FROM StoreImpl s JOIN s.taxCodes t

named-query.name: TAX_JURISDICTION_UIDS_WITH_STORE
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT j.uidPk FROM StoreImpl s JOIN s.taxJurisdictions j

named-query.name: PAYMENT_GATEWAYS_WITH_STORE
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p.uidPk FROM StoreImpl s JOIN s.paymentGateways p

named-query.name: STORE_WITH_ORDER_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT s.uidPk FROM OrderImpl o, StoreImpl s WHERE o.storeCode = s.code AND s.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: STORE_WITH_USER_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT s.uidPk FROM CmUserImpl c JOIN c.stores s WHERE s.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: STORE_WITH_SHIPPING_SERVICE_LEVEL_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT s.store.uidPk FROM ShippingServiceLevelImpl s WHERE s.store.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: STORE_WITH_PROMOTION_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT p.store.uidPk FROM PromotionRuleImpl p WHERE p.store.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: STORE_WITH_IMPORTJOB_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT i.store.uidPk FROM ImportJobImpl i WHERE i.store.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: STORE_WITH_STORE_ASSOCIATION_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT s.uidPk FROM StoreImpl s WHERE ?1 MEMBER OF s.associatedStoreUids.uidPk

named-query.name: STORE_WITH_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM StoreImpl s WHERE s.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: STORE_WITH_CATALOG_UID
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM StoreImpl s WHERE s.catalog.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: STORE_WITH_CATALOG_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM StoreImpl s WHERE s.catalog.code = ?1

named-query.name: STORE_DISPLAYABLE_FLAG
named-query.query: SELECT s.displayOutOfStock FROM StoreImpl s WHERE s.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: STORE_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT s.name FROM StoreImpl s WHERE s.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATALOG_CURRENCY_SELECT_ALL_SUPPORTED
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM StoreCurrencyImpl s

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_WAREHOUSE_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT w.uidPk FROM WarehouseImpl w

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_WAREHOUSES
named-query.query: SELECT w FROM WarehouseImpl w

named-query.name: FIND_WAREHOUSE_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT w FROM WarehouseImpl w WHERE w.name = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_WAREHOUSE_UIDS_IN_STORE_USE
named-query.query: SELECT w.uidPk FROM StoreImpl s JOIN s.warehouses w WHERE w.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_WAREHOUSE_UIDS_IN_USER_USE
named-query.query: SELECT w.uidPk FROM CmUserImpl c JOIN c.warehouses w WHERE w.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_WAREHOUSE_UIDS_IN_IMPORTJOB_USE
named-query.query: SELECT i.warehouse.uidPk FROM ImportJobImpl i WHERE i.warehouse.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_WAREHOUSE_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT w FROM WarehouseImpl w WHERE w.code = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_WAREHOUSE_UIDS_IN_INVENTORY_USE
named-query.query: SELECT i.warehouseUid FROM InventoryImpl i WHERE i.warehouseUid = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_VALID_STORE_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT s.code FROM StoreImpl s WHERE UPPER(s.code) = UPPER(?1)
